member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceCollisionException
member.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceCollisionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)

member.param: The information about the current exception.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceHandle
member.summary: Represents a handle to object.

member.summary: Frees the instance handle.

member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether an instance handle is valid.
member.returns: true if the handle is valid; false if the handle is not valid.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceHandleConflictException

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey
member.summary: Represents an instance key and contains an identifier and metadata associated with the instance key. An instance key acts as a non-unique alias for an instance.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class using the GUID associated with the instance key passed.
member.param: The GUID associated with the instance key.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.#ctor(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue})
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class using the GUID and metadata associated with the instance key.
member.param: The GUID associated with the instance key.
The dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the GUID associated with the current object (stored in the property) with the GUID associated with the object.
member.returns: true if the GUIDs are same; otherwise returns false.
member.param: The GUID to be compared with the current object.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a unique hash code for the current object.
member.returns: The unique hash code.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.InvalidKey
member.summary: Returns an invalid object. An invalid object has Guid.Empty value for the property and a false value for the property.
member.returns: An invalid instance key.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance key is valid.
member.returns: true if the instance key is valid; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key.
member.returns: The dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey.Value
member.summary: Gets the GUID value associated with the current instance key.
member.returns: The GUID value associated with the current instance key.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException
member.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects to find an instance key in the unassociated state, but finds the key in a different state.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The information about the current exception.
The contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the error message passed as a parameter.
member.param: The reason for the exception.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the error message and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
member.param: The reason for the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Guid,System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey,System.Guid)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the name of the command, ID of the instance against which the command was executed, instance key information, and the instance ID that is currently associated with the instance key passed as parameters.
member.param: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
The ID of the instance against which the command was executed. The command failed because the instance key is already associated with another instance whose ID is represented by the parameter.
The instance key information.
The ID of the instance that is currently associated with the instance key.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Guid,System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey,System.Guid,System.Exception)

member.param: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
The ID of the instance against which the command was executed. The command failed because the instance key is already associated with another instance whose ID is represented by the parameter.
The instance key information.
The ID of the instance that is currently associated with the instance key.
The exception that caused the current exception.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.#ctor(System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Guid,System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKey,System.Guid,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the name of the command, ID of the instance against which the command was executed, instance key information, the instance ID that is currently associated with the instance key, the error message that describes the exception, and inner exception information passed as parameters.
member.param: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.

The ID of the instance against which the command was executed. The command failed because the instance key is already associated with another instance whose ID is represented by the conflictingInstanceId parameter.
The instance key information.
The ID of the instance that is currently associated with the instance key.
The reason for the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.ConflictingInstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID currently associated with the instance key. The persistence provider expects to find the instance key in an unassociated state, but the key is associated with this instance ID.
member.returns: The instance ID.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Sets the object with information about the exception.
member.param: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The contextual information about the source or the destination.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyCollisionException.InstanceKey
member.summary: Contains information about the instance key.
member.returns: The instance key information.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyState
member.summary: Contains a list of valid states for instance keys.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyState.Unknown
member.summary: The instance key is not associated with any instance.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyState.Associated
member.summary: The instance key is associated with a non-completed instance.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyState.Completed
member.summary: The instance key was associated with an instance, which is no longer active.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyView
member.summary: Provides a view into instance key information.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyView.InstanceKey
member.summary: Gets the value of the instance key (GUID).
member.returns: The value of the instance key.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyView.InstanceKeyMetadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata for the instance key as a dictionary of XNames and corresponding InstanceValue objects.
member.returns: The metadata for the instance key.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyView.InstanceKeyMetadataConsistency
member.summary: Gets consistency of the metadata (None, In Doubt, or Partial) of the instance key.
member.returns: The consistency of the metadata.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceKeyView.InstanceKeyState
member.summary: Gets the state of the instance key (Unassociated, Associated, or Completed).
member.returns: The state of the instance key.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceLockLostException
member.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it cannot perform the command because the lock on the instance does not match the lock associated with the instance handle against which the command was executed. Either the owner or the version does not match.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class using the error message.

member.param: The reason for the exception.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceState
member.summary: This enumeration contains a list of states of an instance.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceState.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is in Unknown state.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceState.Uninitialized
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is uninitialized. An uninitialized instance is an instance that has never been persisted.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceState.Initialized
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is initialized. An initialized instance is an instance that has been persisted at least once and can be persisted again in the future.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceState.Completed
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is in completed state. A completed instance cannot be persisted again in the future.

member.returns: The state of the asynchronous operation.

The command to be executed.
The timeout value for the command execution.
The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
The state information.

An instance identifier.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceStoreQueryResult
member.summary: Provides extensible mechanism for retrieving data from an instance store without requiring an instance handle from the caller. For example, a caller may want to retrieve owner metadata for all the instance owners in the store.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

member.summary: Stores the information about instance data and metadata.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class by using value object passed as a parameter.
member.param: The value object.

The options for the value object )

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue.DeletedValue
member.summary: Gets the previously deleted value.
member.returns: An .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue.IsDeletedValue
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the object represents a deleted value.
member.returns: true if the object represents a deleted value, otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue.Options
member.summary: Specifies the options for an instance value. The options are: None, Optional, WriteOnly.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue.Value
member.summary: Gets the value as an object.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueConsistency
member.summary: Describes the consistency guarantee of the instance values contained in a specified dictionary.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueConsistency.None
member.summary: Indicates that there is no consistency guarantee.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueConsistency.InDoubt
member.summary: Indicates that the consistency of the instance value is in doubt.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueConsistency.Partial
member.summary: Indicates that the consistency of the instance value is partial.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueOptions
member.summary: Contains options for instance values to indicate whether the instance values are write-only, optional, there are no instance values.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueOptions.None
member.summary: Indicates that there are no instance values.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueOptions.Optional
member.summary: Indicates that a host can function without knowing the value of this instance value.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValueOptions.WriteOnly
member.summary: Indicates that the instance value is write-only. The instance value can be used for administration purposes.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView
member.summary: Represents view of an instance. For example, the method implementations return an object that provides a view into the instance data in the persistence store.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceData
member.summary: Gets instance data as a dictionary of names and values.
member.returns: The instance data.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceDataConsistency
member.summary: Gets the consistency (None, In Doubt, and Partial) of the instance data.
member.returns: The consistency (None, In Doubt, and Partial) of the instance data.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the identifier (ID) of the instance as a GUID.
member.returns: The ID of the instance.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys
member.summary: Gets the instance keys as a dictionary of instance key identifiers and associated objects.
member.returns: A dictionary of instance key identifiers and their associated with instance key view objects.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeysConsistency
member.summary: Gets the consistency value of instance keys.
member.returns: The consistency value of instance keys.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceMetadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata of an instance as a dictionary of names and objects.
member.returns: The metadata of the instance.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceMetadataConsistency
member.summary: Gets the consistency of the instance metadata.
member.returns: The consistency of the instance metadata.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceOwner
member.summary: Gets the owner of the instance.
member.returns: The owner of the instance.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceOwnerMetadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata for an instance owner as a dictionary of names and values.
member.returns: The metadata.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceOwnerMetadataConsistency
member.summary: Gets the consistency of the instance owner metadata.
member.returns: The consistency of the instance owner metadata.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceState
member.summary: Gets the state of an instance (Unknown, Uninitialized, Initialized, and Completed).
member.returns: The state of the instance.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceStoreQueryResults
member.summary: Gets a collection of objects.
member.returns: A .

member.returns: true if the instance view is bound to an instance; otherwise false.

member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the instance view is bound to an instance owner.
